task.title: Troubleshooting
task.shortdesc: Fix common setup and runtime issues when generating words and scores.

step.cmd: If you get FileNotFoundException, confirm CollinsScrabbleWords2019.txt is in the working directory and the filename matches exactly.
If scoring throws IllegalArgumentException, validate that dictionary entries contain only letters Aâ€“Z (uppercase expected).
If runtime is slow, note that getWords() scans the entire dictionary; runtime grows roughly linearly with dictionary size.
If you moved the dictionary to another folder, avoid hard-coding an absolute path; keep a relative workflow so the code runs on other machines.
